item.title: Scverse Hackathon 2023-04 Heidelberg
item.description: Welcome Join us for the scverse Hackathon taking place from Wednesday, April 26th, 12:00 PM to Friday, April 28th, afternoon at BioQuant (Neuenheimer Feld 267, 69120 Heidelberg, Germany). The scverse hackathon is free. The event was invite only. We will try to make future editions open to everyone. Event Schedule Wednesday, April 26th (SR041) 13:30 – 14:00 — PI introductions (Julio Saez-Rodriguez, Wolfgang Huber) 14:00 – 14:30 — Hackathon introduction 14:30 – 15:00 — State of the scverse + Q&A 15:00 – 15:30 — Coffee break 15:30 – 18:30 — Split into groups and hack 18:30 – 19:00 — Short updates from teams Thursday, April 27th (SR042 & SR044)
